text: Underground ( / Podzemlje) is a 1995 international black comedy movie directed by Emir Kusturica and starring Miki Manojlović, Lazar Ristovski, Mirjana Joković, Slavko Štimac, Ernst Stötzner, Srđan Todorović. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1995 comedy-drama movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:1990s epic movies Category:1990s war movies Category:Serbian movies Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Czech comedy movies Category:Czech drama movies Category:Bulgarian movies Category:British comedy- drama movies Category:British black comedy movies Category:British war movies Category:American war movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:Faroese movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Emir Kusturica Category:Movies set in Serbia Category:Movies set in Germany Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in the 1960s Category:Movies set in the 1990s
title: Underground (1995 movie)
